name: MineSweeper (houssamChab)
description:
I Re-create Minesweeper in unity

Minesweeper is a single-player puzzle video game. The objective of the game is to clear a rectangular board containing hidden "mines" or bombs without detonating any of them, with help from clues about the number of neighboring mines in each field. ... If a square containing a mine is revealed, the player loses the game
